Naruto creates two clones who grab each other, while Naruto grabs them both. Naruto starts spinning around to gather sufficient speed, then releases the clones at the target in a  [[shuriken]]-like fashion to strike them.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the movie, this technique was explicitly named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 2]]''.

[[es:Shuriken de Rotación de Clones]]
[[pl:Bunshin Hiya]]
